name: Robert Lee
bio: Hello, visitor. Welcome to my resume site. I want you to get some useful information about me here.
summary: I have been building software for more than 5+ years. I do software development, architecture, automation, dev management, data centric devops, and appsec. As an entrepreneur I am always on the lookout for the next opportunity. Lots of experience and I work hard to please my clients.

education.name: Boston University
education.comment: Boston University is a private research university in Boston, Massachusetts. BU was founded in 1839 by a group of Boston Methodists with its original campus in Newbury, Vermont, before being chartered in Boston in 1869.

education.name: University of San Diego, CA
education.degree: Master of Science in Applied Data Science
education.comment: The University of San Diego is a private Catholic university located in San Diego, California. The university is known for its strong academic programs, particularly in business, law, and engineering. The campus is situated on a beautiful hilltop overlooking the Pacific Ocean and offers a variety of student activities and organizations. Students at USD have access to a range of resources, including research opportunities, internships, and study abroad programs. The university has a diverse student body and is committed to providing a supportive and inclusive community for all students.

experience.company: AI and Robotics Ventures Pittsburgh, PA
